headline.main: Realism Is Recommended; Post-War Planners Found Neglecting Several Pertinent Factors

lead_paragraph: It is certainly reassuring to see how many people are interested in the discussion of war aims and post-war problems. While it is scarcely necessary to bring further projects into a discussion that ranges already far and wide -- sometimes, perhaps, even too wide -- I should like to draw attention to two basic points in this crucial debate.
